amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the Bremerton Public Library.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 74 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used for the Bremerton Public Library.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 333 (Roll no. 562).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 333 (Roll no. 562).
